note:
I‘m a bot and post every 3 days the current amount of CO2 molecules in the air. Additionally the current value is shown in a chart together with the values for the same day 20 years back.

Source gml.noaa.gov. Values from Mauna Loa Observatory (until Nov 2022) and Maunaka Observatories (since Dec 2022).

If no new source data is available, the post interval can be longer.

note: Allotment life.... Largely images and information about our successes and failures from our allotments in the centre of England. Mostly no dig, mostly raised beds apart from the fruit and potatoes which are in tubs. We keep chickens too and even though we have been doing this for a number of years we learn something new every week. It can be hard and exhausting but at the same time it can be rewarding and fascinating. We love it…

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

My name is Elizabeth but please call me Lisa.

I'm probably best known as the person who started the #Safari and #WebKit projects at #Apple. You may think you know my deadname but... you don't.

I've drawn underground comics, pioneered using a Mac for newspaper graphics and developed software at Adobe and Netscape.

Now I write video #transcoding scripts and sometimes podcast.

I’ve hung up my pro agronomy boots, but they come in handy when I cycle to the fruit, veg and flower allotment here in rural East Devon, U. K. Most things botanical 🍃 and invertebrate 🐛will catch my attention🌻. I wear different boots at a workshop by the river where I make all sorts of stuff.

Maps, plants, animals, context collapse. I don't really talk about work here. Currently working on data at Bellingcat, previously at Stamen, learning at Recurse Center, exploring at BuzzFeed Open Lab.
